      • getId

        public int getId()
        Description copied from interface: Cluster
        This method return the actual ClusterId. Please remember that the final and official ClusterId
        is defined by the Profile even if the Cluster is defined by a Cluster Library.
        Specified by:
        getId in interface Cluster
        Returns:
        the ClusterId

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Specified by:
        getName in interface Cluster
        Returns:
        This method return the String identifying the human readable name of the cluster.
        The name is assigned by the document defining the Cluster, either the Cluster Library or
        or the Profile
